name: LinkIt!
storyline:
LinkIt! is like a version of your childhood game connect the dots with minimalistic and eye-pleasing style that you will need some reflexes.

There is not any stage or different difficulty level. You need to beat your or friends scores. Game starts slow and speed increases by connecting the dots but it has a limit.

There are three simple rules:

Try to link every blue dot by holding the screen
Don't miss any of the blue dots
Don't link the red ones

It seems too easy, but there is a difficult in simplicity.
